    Check out the Latest Middletown Has to Offer

  1. Mayor Daniel Drew Proposes 2019 - 2020 Budget

    Read on...

  2. Middletown Awarded AAA Bond Rating

    For the fourth year in a row, Middletown has been awarded a AAA bond rating – the highest a city can achieve – by Standard & Poors. Read on...

  1. Middletown Spotlights
    Learn more about Middletown.

  1. Middletown to Update Plan of Conservation and Development

    We are preparing an update to the City’s Plan of Conservation and Development, which serves as the central resource that will help to guide the City’s path over the next decade. Read on...

  2. Volunteer for the Middletown Medical Reserve Corp

    The mission of the Medical Reserve Corps (MRC) is to engage volunteers to strengthen public health, emergency response, and community resiliency. Read on...

  3. March - April Arts and Culture Newsletter Released

    Featuring a recent addition to "The City Art Collection", a new work by Poet Laureate Cheryl Anne Hale, a list of galleries, and more! Read on...

  4. Middletown: Certified Sustainable

    Along with twenty-one other Connecticut towns and cities, Middletown was recently recognized as a Sustainable CT certified community. Read on...

  5. Mayor's Message

    Welcome to the City of Middletown, I am Mayor Daniel T. Drew and I would like to thank you for stopping by. As you navigate through the site you will find an abundance of information on the city, our services, and what we have to offer. Read on...

  6. Sign Up for Notifications

    You can receive email and/or SMS(text) message alerts when emergencies, parking bans, and other community-wide notifications are announced through the City of Middletown's website. Read on...
/CivicAlerts.aspx
